availablePot().notice: Returns the currently available pot excluding any sponsor-reserved amount.

claim(uint256).notice: Claim equal-share payout for a finalized round if you were a holder in that round.

getSponsor().notice: Get the active sponsor details for the current round.

settle().notice: Settle the pending attempt using the next blockhash. Keeper receives a reward equal to 1e17, paid from the pot.

sponsorPot(string).notice: Sponsor the current round's pot with a message. Replaces the previous sponsor if paying at least 20% more than the previous sponsor amount. The previous sponsor is refunded their amount. Sponsorship resets (message cleared and reserved released) when a round ends on loss.

take().notice: Pay to take the potato. One pending attempt at a time.
